name: Ultimate Zeldo Legend
description:
Grab a friend and SPIN STYLE ATTACK your way to victory

Defeat your evil twin to reclaim the ultimate power

Become the true Hero of Spin

Collect the shards of the Tripleforge

All at the NES's glorious native 240x256 resolution

Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen

This was made for Duplicade 2015, but the version here is updated with stuff that wasn't in the original Duplicade submission :)

---------------------------------------------

VERSION 1.2 CHANGES:

** gamepad support! Controls will automatically be set at the beginning of each match. If no controllers are plugged in, Zeldo uses WASD+space and Lonk uses arrows+enter. With one controller plugged in, Zeldo uses controller and Lonk uses WASD+space. If two controllers are plugged in, both players use controllers. duh.

** bugfix+ players won't get stuck in the walls on the Hidden Forest map.

** minor tweaks to knockback, spinning speeds, etc
